thread.title: Dutch-Belgian supermarket retailer Ahold confirms Q4 sales

author: Koen Van Weel
title: Dutch-Belgian supermarket retailer Ahold confirms Q4 sales
text:
Ideas Dutch-Belgian supermarket retailer Ahold confirms Q4 sales Ahold Delhaize reported net sales growth of 1.6 percent to 15.8 billion euros ($19.3 billion) for the fourth quarter. Published 12 Hours Ago Reuters KOEN VAN WEEL | AFP | Getty Images 
Dutch-Belgian supermarket operator Ahold Delhaize , which has two-thirds of its business in the United States, on Wednesday reported net sales growth of 1.6 percent to 15.8 billion euros ($19.3 billion) for the fourth quarter and confirmed its financial targets for 2018. 
The result confirmed figures released in a trading update in January. Related Securities
